imdb.plot outline: New York Caribbean TV is your lifestyle and entertainment destination for the latest in island Culture in the big apple. From food, fashion, sports, music and entertainment, business and politics, you'll find it all right here on New York Caribbean.
imdb.title: New York Caribbean EP 12: The English Beat
akas: New York Caribbean EP 12: The English Beat (United States)
plot: Meet Dave Wakeling of legendary ska band, The English Beat and find out how the music of the Caribbean influenced their Iconic sound. Right here on New York Caribbean.::Anthony Geathers

New York Caribbean TV is your lifestyle and entertainment destination for the latest in island Culture in the big apple. From food, fashion, sports, music and entertainment, business and politics, you'll find it all right here on New York Caribbean.::Anthony Geathers
